entries.description: Corroded iron fortresses defend routes to lower layers.
Graz?zt?s corrupt, decadent city spans three layers.
Lolth?s web ensnares all and hides portals to other planes.
A malevolent wilderness surrounding Demogorgon?s ocean fortress.
An endless graveyard ruled by Orcus and the sleepless dead.
A fetid realm of ooze and fungi ruled by Juiblex and Zuggtmoy.
A cruel, desolate realm prowled by Yeenoghu and his gnoll servants.
An endless labyrinth that turns visitors into Baphomet?s prey.
